fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: 3 times per game, go to sleep at night. Gain powerful defense the first two times, but basic the last.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Anyone who visits you that would gain feedback has a 75% chance to receive incorrect feedback. Anyone else has a 50% chance for their ability to fail. Yes, this also applies to attackers who would normally bypass your defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.
